ing: 1 (3 ounce) package smoked salmon, cut into 1-inch chunks
1/4 cup heavy whipping cream, or as needed
des: "This is a savory treat, and as a bonus it's low carb. This dip goes great with Mary's Gone CrackersÂ®. You can also dip celery or pork rinds, or freeze scoops of it for a savory fat bomb."
ins: Blend cream cheese and butter together in a bowl using a mixer. Add salmon, Worcestershire sauce, dill, paprika, and liquid smoke; mix well. Stir in cream to desired consistency.
